resources.string: You are not connected to the internet
You need to have an internet connection to use the GOV.UK app.
Reconnect to the internet and try again.
You\'re using an old version of the app. Update your app to continue.
You need to update your app
You can update your app if you want to get the latest features and improvements.
You’re using an old version of the app
Update the app to the latest version.\n\nIf you’re already using the latest version, try again later.
There was a problem signing you in
Government information and services for you
You can unlock the app with your face, fingerprint or iris.
If you do not want to use your biometrics, you can unlock the app with your phone’s pin or pattern, or with your email address and password.
If you have biometrics turned on, you’ll be able to use your fingerprint, face or iris to unlock the app within 30 days of entering your GOV.UK One Login details.
If you do not want to use biometrics, you can use your phone’s pin or pattern instead.
Anyone who can unlock your phone with their fingerprint, face or iris or with your phone’s pin or pattern might be able to access your app.
You can turn off biometrics at any time.
